AssignableQueue.title: Assignable queue
AssignableQueue.description: A queue to which assignable entities can be assigned

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of what this queue is for

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

subGroupVisible.title: Sub group visible
subGroupVisible.description: True if the queue is visible from sub-groups of the group to which it belongs

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

CalendarDateCalculation.title: Calendar date calculation
CalendarDateCalculation.description: Data for calculating a date based on the business week and holiday configuration in server

holidayTag.title: Holiday tag
holidayTag.description: Holiday tag that holidays must have to be considered in the calculation. Only valid for includeDaysType `businessdays`.

includeDaysType.title: Include days type
includeDaysType.description: Which days to include in the day count

location.title: Location
location.description: The location that will be used to determine which business days to include in the calculation. Only valid for includeType `businessdays`.

numberOfDays.title: Number of days
numberOfDays.description: Number of days after the requested start date

numberOfHours.title: Number ofhours
numberOfHours.description: Number of hours after the requested start date

startDate.title: Start date
startDate.description: The date to start calculations from

code.title: Code
code.description: The code for this geographic zone

country.title: Country
country.description: The country to which this geographic zone belongs

displayName.title: Display name
displayName.description: The formatted name of the geographic zone

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of the referenced element

name.title: Name
name.description: The name for this geographic zone

zoneType.title: Zone type
zoneType.description: Type of geographic zone, varies by country

Group.title: Group
Group.description: A named group within the system

displayName.title: Display name
displayName.description: The formatted name of this group

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this group

parent.title: Parent
parent.description: A reference to the `Group` that is the parent of this group

securityZone.title: Security zone
securityZone.description: A reference to the `SecurityZone` that this group belongs to

supervisor.title: Supervisor
supervisor.description: A reference to the `User` that represents the supervisor of this group

GroupRegion.title: Group region
GroupRegion.description: The relationship between a group and its regions

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this group region

GroupUser.title: Details about a user's involvement in a group
GroupUser.description: Details about a user's involvement in a group

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

loadFactor.title: Load factor
loadFactor.description: Percentage value of normal workload to be given to this user in this group

loadFactorType.title: Load factor type
loadFactorType.description: Type of load factor privileges the user has in this group

manager.title: Manager
manager.description: Flag indicating whether the user has permission to see activity within the group

member.title: Member
member.description: Flag indicating whether the user is a working member of the group (for purposes of work assignment, for example), as opposed to simply being associated with the group as a manager or other auxiliary person

Holiday.title: Holiday
Holiday.description: A named holiday within the system

appliesToAllZones.title: Applies to all zones
appliesToAllZones.description: Flag indicating whether this holiday applies to all zones

holidayTags.title: Holiday tags
holidayTags.description: The tags that observe this holiday

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of a holiday in the business calendar

occurrenceDate.title: Occurrence date
occurrenceDate.description: The date of a holiday in the business calendar

HolidayZone.title: Holiday zone
HolidayZone.description: A geographic zone associated with a holiday

code.title: Code
code.description: The code for this geographic zone

country.title: Country
country.description: The country to which the zone belongs

geographicZone.title: Geographic zone
geographicZone.description: A zone that observes a certain holiday

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of the referenced element

zoneType.title: Zone type
zoneType.description: Type of geographic zone, varies by country

Organization.title: Organization
Organization.description: An `Organization` represents an organization that can contain groups and users. One `Organization` is used to represent the insurer, while other `Organization` elements represent external organizations, such as third-party agencies.

carrier.title: Carrier
carrier.description: A `true` value indicates that this organization represents the insurer rather than an external organization. Only one `Organization` within the system can have this field set to `true`.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Information about the primary contact for the organization

masterAdmin.title: Master admin
masterAdmin.description: A `true` value indicates that this `Organization` has administrator powers over all other `Organization` elements in the system

rootGroup.title: Root group
rootGroup.description: A reference to the `Group` that is the root group for this `Organization`

Region.title: Region
Region.description: A geographic region that can be assigned as an area of responsibility for a user or group

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of the referenced element

RegionZone.title: Region zone
RegionZone.description: A geographic zone associated with a region

code.title: Code
code.description: The code for this geographic zone

country.title: Country
country.description: The country to which the zone belongs

geographicZone.title: Geographic zone
geographicZone.description: A geographic zone used as a template to create this region zone. Upon creation, this region zone will be assigned the geographic zone's code, country, and zoneType.

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of the referenced element

zoneType.title: Zone type
zoneType.description: Type of geographic zone, varies by country

Role.title: Role
Role.description: A named role within the system

carrierInternal.title: Carrier internal
carrierInternal.description: A `true` value indicates that the role is applicable to users internal to the carrier organization

displayName.title: Display name
displayName.description: The formatted name of the role

RolePermission.title: Role permission
RolePermission.description: A RolePermission represents a permission granted to a particular role

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

permission.title: Permission
permission.description: A reference to a `SystemPermissionType` that has been granted to a role

SecurityZone.title: Security zone
SecurityZone.description: Security Zone is used to partition groups, users and entities assigned to them into separate zones

description.title: Description
description.description: An optional, more detailed description of the security zone

displayName.title: Display name
displayName.description: The formatted name of this security zone

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this security zone

User.title: User
User.description: A named user within the system

active.title: Active
active.description: A `true` value indicates that the user is currently active and allowed to log in. A `false` value indicates the user has been deactivated and cannot currently log in.

cellPhone.title: Cell phone
cellPhone.description: The cell phone number for the user

employeeNumber.title: Employee number
employeeNumber.description: The employee number assigned to the user

externalUser.title: External user
externalUser.description: A `true` value indicates that the user represents a user from an external organization, rather than a user from within the insurer's organization

firstName.title: First name
firstName.description: The first name of the user

gender.title: Gender type
gender.description: The type of the user's gender, such as `female` or `male`

groups.title: Groups
groups.description: The groups this user is part of

homePhone.title: Home phone
homePhone.description: The home phone number for the user

lastName.title: Last name
lastName.description: The last name of the user

pronounAggregate.title: Pronoun aggregate type
pronounAggregate.description: The type of the user's aggregate pronoun, such as `she/her/hers` or `self-identify`

pronounAggregateDisplay.title: Pronoun aggregate display
pronounAggregateDisplay.description: A formatted representation of the pronoun aggregate for this `User`

roles.title: Roles
roles.description: The roles assigned to the user

sexAssignedAtBirth.title: Sex assigned at birth type
sexAssignedAtBirth.description: The type of the user's sex assigned at birth, such as `female` or `male`

suffix.title: Suffix
suffix.description: The name suffix of the user

vacationStatus.title: Vacation status
vacationStatus.description: Indicates whether the user is considered to be on vacation

workPhone.title: Work phone
workPhone.description: The work phone number for the user

UserAttribute.title: User attribute
UserAttribute.description: Join table linking attributes to users

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this element

state.title: State
state.description: The state in which this attribute is applicable

value.title: Value
value.description: The attribute value for this user

UserGroupReference.title: User group reference
UserGroupReference.description: A reference to a `Group` that the user belongs to

displayName.title: Display name
displayName.description: The formatted name of the element

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of the referenced element

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the referenced element

uri.title: URI
uri.description: The canonical URI for the referenced element

UserRegion.title: User region
UserRegion.description: The relationship between a user and its regions

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of this user region

UserRoleReference.title: User role reference
UserRoleReference.description: A reference to a `Role` that has been granted to a user

displayName.description: The formatted name of the element

id.title: ID
id.description: The unique identifier of the referenced element

type.title: Type
type.description: The type of the referenced element
